title: Some of you may enjoy this...
content:
These are photos I took while in Greece last year, I think it was on the island of Santorini at a museum but I cannot recall. I just came across them and knew they may be of interest to some.  
enjoy.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC\_0073.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021084119/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0073.JPG) | 120.96 KB |
| [DSC\_0080.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021084119/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0080.JPG) | 93.97 KB |
author: becker513

comments.content:
For the first one: Anyone who would letterspace hieroglyphics would steal sheep.

For the second one: Isn't that poor kerning in the third line?

By the way, i saw this strange gate in helsinki. Does anyone know what it might be?  
weird.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021084119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alien_5251.jpg)
an observation? or a direct translation?

i'm just curious about what this is. is it just free form or some kind of letterforms?  
Maybe it's the gate of the home of Klingon family living in Helsinki?

Magnus, do you remember whereabouts in Helsinki that gate is? The location might help.  
My guess is that it's just for decorative purpose.

No, sorry. i don't remember exactly where. i was a tourist for one day and was running around shooting anything interesting. i agree that it's most likely for decorative purpose. at the same time they have a glyph like feel.

It's nice, though. And now I suppose I have to start hunting for it...

I was born in Helsinki and have lived here most of my life, but I'm sure I've never seen that gate!

Dan,  
I have a real fondness for the rough greek letter inscribed in stone. I am hoping you have more images in higher resolution that I might see?

Thanks for posting those, they still speak despite the weatbering of time.

ChrisL

"Does anyone know what it might be?"

Evil I'd say... pure evil.
